queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:edit}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:edit}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:view}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:view}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[3].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[3].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:view}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:view}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:edit}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:edit}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:admin}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:admin}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:admin}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:admin}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[3].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[3].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:edit}}.rules[1] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:env:default:edit}}.rules[1] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, delete, deletecollection, patch, update) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[2] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[2] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, update, patch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:edit}}.rules[1] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:package-manager:ns:default:edit}}.rules[1] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, delete, deletecollection, patch, update) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.query_name: Cluster Admin Rolebinding With Superuser Permissions
queries.description: Ensure that the cluster-admin role is only used where required (RBAC)

files.expected_value: Resource name 'crossplane-package-manager' of kind 'ClusterRoleBinding' isn't binding 'cluster-admin' role with superuser permissions
files.actual_value: Resource name 'crossplane-package-manager' of kind 'ClusterRoleBinding' is binding 'cluster-admin' role with superuser permissions
